articles.title: BAFTA Television Awards 2020 SNUB Gavin And Stacey and Line Of Duty - Daily Mail
articles.description: Fans of the shows took to Twitter to express their dismay over why they were not nominated in major categories after the nominations were announced on on Thursday.
